title.@value: IANA IP Protocol Numbers Lookup Adapter

description.@value: The Lookup Adapter for the Watchlist.
Cache for Reverse DNS Lookups against pihole
A cache for the Watchlist entries to speed up lookup.
Performs Reverse DNS Lookup against the source and dest IP addresses

title.@value: IANA IP Protocol Numbers Lookup Table

description.@value: The lookup table for the Watchlist. It contains three default keys for "ip", "user" and "hash" values.
Identify & tag incoming logs as a sourcetype.

source.@value:
pipeline "00 - 01 | Preprocessing - Sourcetype Tagging"
stage 1 match either
rule "PRE-processing | Event Source Product Identification (Sophos Firewall)"
rule "PRE-processing | Event Source Product Identification (Sophos Web Proxy)"
end

pipeline "40 - 59 | Enrichment"
stage 40 match either
rule "Enrichment | Convert ICMP Type Number to Name"
rule "Enrichment | GeoIP Lookup - Destination"
rule "Enrichment | GeoIP Lookup - Source"
rule "Enrichment | IP Protocol Name Lookup"
rule "Enrichment | Reverse DNS Lookup - Destination IP"
rule "Enrichment | Reverse DNS Lookup - Source IP"
stage 41 match pass
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=inbound_lab"
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=inbound_lan"
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=inbound_wan"
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=internal_lab"
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=internal_lan"
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=lab_lan"
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=lan_lab"
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=outbound_lab"
rule "Enrichment | network_direction=outbound_lan"
stage 59 match pass
rule "Enrichment | Threat Indicated = True"
rule "Enrichment | Threat Indicated = False"
stage 58 match pass
rule "Enrichment | Threat Indicated Lookup"
end

pipeline "02 - 09 | Stream Routing"
stage 9 match either
rule "PRE-processing | Stream Routing (Sophos Firewall)"
rule "PRE-processing | Stream Routing (Sophos Web Proxy)"
end

pipeline "10 - 19 | Parsing - Sophos Firewall Logs"
stage 10 match either
rule "Parsing | Sophos Firewall - Base (KV)"
stage 11 match pass
rule "Parsing | Sophos Firewall - 'action' Field"
rule "Parsing | Sophos Firewall - 'name' Field"
rule "Parsing | Sophos Firewall - 'tcpflags' Field"
rule "Parsing | Sophos Firewall - 'info' Field"
stage 12 match either
rule "Parsing | Sophos Firewall - Remove Insignificant Fields"
end

pipeline "60 - 79 | Threat Intel"
stage 60 match either
rule "Threat Intel | Tor Exit Node (Destination IP)"
rule "Threat Intel | Tor Exit Node (Source IP)"
end

title.@value: 10 - 19 | Parsing - Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs

description.@value: Parse Sophos UTM Web Proxy logs

source.@value:
pipeline "10 - 19 | Parsing - Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs"
stage 10 match either
rule "Parsing | Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs"
stage 11 match either
rule "Parsing | Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs - fix 'categoryname'"
rule "Parsing | Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs - fix 'country'"
rule "Parsing | Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs - fix 'filteraction'"
rule "Parsing | Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs - fix 'name'"
rule "Parsing | Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs - fix 'profile'"
rule "Parsing | Sophos UTM Web Proxy Logs - fix 'ua'"
stage 12 match either
rule "POST-processing | Enforce ECS compliant field names - Sophos Web Proxy"
end

description.@value: Normalize Sophos Firewall logs to comply with Graylog Information Model (GIM)

source.@value:
pipeline "20 - 39 | Normalization - Sophos Firewall"
stage 20 match either
rule "Normalization | Sophos Firewall - Enforce GIM Field Names"
stage 21 match either
rule "Normalization | GIM - Enforce Field Types"
stage 22 match either
rule "Normalization | GIM - Lowercase String Values"
stage 23 match either
rule "Normalization | Sophos Network Names"
end

title.@value: 2021-10-10 0000 Falco UDP to Valve IP in Dubai
2021-10-09 0400 Sophos ICMP Echo to Dubai IP

httpproxy NOT "action=\"pass\"" NOT "CMD" NOT "application=\"winupdat\"" NOT "id=\"0003\"" NOT "id=\"0067\"" NOT "ua=\"OfficeClickToRun\"" NOT "confd" NOT "ua\"Microsoft-Delivery-Optimization/10.0\""
